description:
By breaking taboo and playing Kokkuri-san alone, Ichimatsu Kohina summons the fox ghost Kokkuri-san, who begins haunting her...
The haunted life of the cup noodle loving and self proclaimed doll Kohina and the motherly Kokkuri-san cooking three meals a day begins!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 人形少女・ミーツ・コックリさん!
